Description: On I-395 at mile marker 9.7 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north left shoulder, left lane, and center lane are closed. Traffic backups are approximately 1.0 mile.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-77 South at mile marker 24.1 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to high wind.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 56.2 in the County of Chesterfield, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 191 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The west right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-77 North at mile marker 0 in the County of Carroll, motorists can expect delays due to high wind.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 73 in the City of Richmond, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The south exit 73 narrows.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Tractor Trailer

Description: On VA-28 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Willard Rd; Rt. 8457W (Fairfax County); Rt. 6215W (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The north entrance ramp narrows.
